sections.text: Option of buyer to supplement priceWhen a sale is subject to rescission for lesion the buyer may elect either to return the immovable to the seller, or to keep the immovable by giving to the seller a supplement equal to the difference between the price paid by the buyer and the fair market value of the immovable determined according to the preceding Article.Amended by Acts 1871, No. 87; Acts 1993, No. 841, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1995.
